Package com.sait.ciaoToursEMS.controllers

Class AuthController

java.lang.Object
com.sait.ciaoToursEMS.controllers.AuthController
@CrossOrigin(origins="http://localhost:3000", maxAge=3600L, allowCredentials="true") @RestController @RequestMapping("/api/auth") public class AuthController extends Object
AuthController Handles all user login and signup requests
